title: If SKT wins how will you make the skins different from the other ones?
body: I think you should add a kind of 'surname' to the skins: SKT Legend(s)

replies.body: I have been thinking about this a lot since Sunday. Also if KOO win, which one of their many _many_ different uniforms to we use as inspiration? This is going to be a tough one!

More spoilers in the red tracker. Now there's little point in watching the Quarterfinals or Semifinals except for maybe highlight videos, because Riot still refuses to maintain a spoiler-free environment for any events.

Edit: And again, downvotes from people who care more about selfish convenience than about other people getting to enjoy Worlds without knowing all outcomes in advance. No Riot response, as always. Is it that hard to imagine being unable to watch matches the day they happen? Some folks have lives AND want to enjoy esports events.
how is this a spoiler?

But, no, it's easier to blame the person making a fuss than it is to make even the simplest change to a comfortable convenience.

If i record all of the games in the NFL playoffs and intend to watch them later does that give me the right to wander around the nfl website and assume that there will be zero spoilers? does it give me the right to watch local news? national news? log onto facebook? look at ANY social media without suspecting that there may be spoilers?

The answer is no and this same logic can be applied to your situation.  If you couldn't catch the match when it was originally broadcast it becomes your responsibility to avoid the spoilers by not going and looking at places where they will logically show up.  

As much as i feel your pain that something you were looking forward to watching and seeing the results of got spoiled, it is really your own fault for roaming around the league boards.

If SKT wins you have a couple of options:

1. Upgrade the current SKT skins to a higher tier with no additional charge to people who purchased them before. You can do this either by making new versions of the same skins for the same champions, or just straight upgrading the current ones.

2. Make new skins, but advance one tier for every time the same team has won the world championships (does not have to be in a row.) In this case, the new skins would be 975 each. The probability of a team going past 1820 RP skins is so astronomically low that there is no need to worry about it.

Actually this brings up an interesting point that I want to provide a little clarity on; the winners of the World Championship don't need to have played the champion that they want immortalised in a skin in the playoffs. We work with each player and they give us a few choices to grant us a measure of flexibility within our pipeline and then we show them the concepts for feedback before moving forward with the final designs. For example, Looper didn't have to play Singed in the finals; he was already famous for his Singed play and we would have gladly gone with that choice.

Okay, I kind of left that too ambiguous, but thank you for clearing up the process a little.  What I meant to say is riot tells them no they can't select the champs they got last time for getting a team skin.
